name: Rutter
headline: The Universal API for commerce and accounting
description:
Rutter is building a universal API for e-commerce platforms, accounting systems and payment processors.

Similar to the financial market before Plaid, the world of business financial data is split across hundreds of platforms like e-commerce storefronts, marketplaces, accounting systems and payment processors, such as Shopify, Amazon, Quickbooks, Netsuite, Stripe and others.  

Each of these platforms has its own app store or its equivalent, and the enterprising developer must spend thousands of hours building integrations in order to access the entire market.

Rutter is an integration layer for any company building integrations into commerce or accounting platforms. You can learn more about our universal API here: https://www.rutter.com/

ONE DATA MODEL
## What is a unified API?
Our common data model allows product teams to easily build and maintain integrations across multiple platforms with ease and minimal effort.
[Explore API Model](https://rutterapi.com/</our-features/apis>)
![A purple screen with a logo and a button that says "your product".](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6420a9777e674a070ce59910/661dc8cd8d4ee4eaa1c4dc05_what-is-unified-api.avif)
## Everything you need to deliver best-in-class integrations
Product and engineering leaders prefer leveraging a Unified API in order to save millions of dollars of engineering cost, expand addressable markets, and improve product quality. The Rutter platform is designed with 3 product pillars in mind.
[Get started with Rutter](https://rutterapi.com/<https:/dashboard.rutterapi.com/sign-up>)
1
[Rutter Link](https://rutterapi.com/</our-features/rutter-link>)
Authentication
Rutter Link enables you to easily implement a white-labeled end-user authentication process. It handles permissions, data governance, and monitors consent.
![A purple screen with a button that says continue.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6420a9777e674a070ce59910/661dc99b82e7693a9ec48b36_rutter-authentication-card-2x.webp)
2
[Our Integrations](https://rutterapi.com/</integrations>)
APIs
Rutter APIs allow you to read, update, write, and remove data across 60+ accounting, commerce, payments, and ads platform used globally by your customers.
![A purple background with a white button that says "Unified API".](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6420a9777e674a070ce59910/661dc9d2f81f183db3903afc_rutter-api-card-2x.webp)
3
[Our Features](https://rutterapi.com/</our-features/monitoring>)
Monitoring & Observability
Rutter dashboard gives you full visibility into the integration lifecycle: authentication, data access, webhooks, and data syncs to easily debug and monitor performance.
![A purple background with a webhook logs button.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6420a9777e674a070ce59910/661dc9d44c768882178d8667_rutter-monitoring-card-2x.webp)

Rudy Dobrzynski
Head of Engineering

“We’ve worked with many providers that weren’t reliable, which is a huge issue. Rutter is the only provider we’ve worked with that’s given us a 99.999% uptime so far. They’re more reliable than the Facebook API.”

## Have questions? We've got answers.
What's your pricing model?
Pricing depends on volume of connections, growth in volume of connections overtime, product capabilities, and platform(s) you are looking to integrate with.
[See our Pricing page for details](https://rutterapi.com/</pricing>)
What platforms does your Unified API integrate with?
We are the leading Unified API for B2B financial products. Building integrations for complex financial products requires a deep understanding of business processes, financial expertise to translate these processes into suitable accounting objects, and an understanding of intricacies and nuances on various accounting platforms. Our commitment lies in developing robust capabilities that address your complex requirements.
[Check out our Integration Library](https://rutterapi.com/</integrations>)
Is there a free trial? Can I try out the product before I buy?
Yes, you can create an account with us and chat with our sales team to walk you through our product demo.
[Get started](https://rutterapi.com/</our-features/apis>)
What's different about Rutter?
At Rutter, we believe that the best B2B products are seamlessly integrated. We're dedicated to creating top-tier product experiences by leveraging our deep understanding of business processes, domain expertise in finance and accounting, and insight into the nuances of different accounting platforms. Our focus is on empowering companies to develop robust financial operating system leveraging our purpose-built Unified API
## Building integrated products is hard. Let us help.
No sales pitches, no hidden costs, and no robots. Just really smart people who want to help you ship integrations faster. How can we help you?

## Have questions? We've got answers.
What's your pricing model?
Pricing depends on volume of connections, growth in volume of connections overtime, product capabilities, and platform(s) you are looking to integrate with.
See our Pricing page for details⟨28⟩
What platforms does your Unified API integrate with?
We are the leading Unified API for B2B financial products. Building integrations for complex financial products requires a deep understanding of business processes, financial expertise to translate these processes into suitable accounting objects, and an understanding of intricacies and nuances on various accounting platforms. Our commitment lies in developing robust capabilities that address your complex requirements.
Check out our Integration Library⟨3⟩
Is there a free trial? Can I try out the product before I buy?
Yes, you can create an account with us and chat with our sales team to walk you through our product demo.
Get started⟨10⟩
What's different about Rutter?
At Rutter, we believe that the best B2B products are seamlessly integrated. We're dedicated to creating top-tier product experiences by leveraging our deep understanding of business processes, domain expertise in finance and accounting, and insight into the nuances of different accounting platforms. Our focus is on empowering companies to develop robust financial operating system leveraging our purpose-built Unified API

generated_description:
### Overview of Rutter

**Name:** Rutter  
**Founded:** 2021  
**Location:** New York  
**Team Size:** 24 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** S19  
**Group Partner:** Michael Seibel  
**Website:** [Rutter](https://rutterapi.com)  
**Mission:** The Universal API for commerce and accounting  

---

### What Does Rutter Do?

Rutter is tackling a significant problem in the fragmented world of business financial data. Just like Plaid unified access to the financial services realm, Rutter is creating a universal API that amalgamates data from various e-commerce platforms, accounting systems, and payment processors. Think of it as a one-stop-shop for integrating and managing financial data from popular platforms like Shopify, Amazon, QuickBooks, NetSuite, Stripe, and more.

---

### The Problem It Solves

In the existing landscape, developers face an uphill battle; each platform comes with its own integration requirements. They often spend countless hours (and dollars) creating and maintaining these connections, which can be tedious and inefficient. Rutter aims to eliminate that friction by being an integration layer for any company building connections into commerce or accounting platforms.

---

### Core Offerings

1. **Unified API Model:**  
   Rutter allows developers to ship integrations in days rather than months by offering a standardized data model across platforms.

2. **Integration Features:**  
   Rutter provides APIs for various domains such as:
   - **Payments API**: Access transactions, subscriptions, and balances.
   - **Accounting API**: Read financial statements, bills, and invoices.
   - **Commerce API**: Manage orders, inventory, and customer data.
   - **Ads API**: Dive into campaign performance and ad account insights.
   - **Bank Feeds API**: Sync bank transactions seamlessly with customer accounting platforms.

3. **Data Governance and Monitoring:**  
   Rutter also includes features like Rutter Link for user authentication and monitoring tools for maintaining integration health.

---

### Use Cases and Solutions

Rutter offers tailored solutions for businesses looking to streamline their financial processes, including:

- **Business Underwriting:** Understand financial statements, revenue, and spending.
- **Invoicing Automation:** Sync data related to invoices efficiently.
- **Expense Management:** Handle expenses from various financial accounts.
- **Sales Tax Automation:** Manage sales tax data effectively.

---

### Why Rutter?

Rutter stands out by allowing companies to develop robust financial applications without reinventing the wheel. With a focus on developer experience, their platform is designed to reduce integration complexity while maintaining a high uptime and reliability. By providing a robust infrastructure, Rutter helps companies save significant engineering time and costs, ultimately allowing them to scale more effectively.

---

In a nutshell, Rutter is revolutionizing how businesses handle commerce and accounting integrations, making the process smoother and more efficient. If you’re part of a business that depends on connecting various financial systems, then Rutter is worth a deep dive. For more, visit their [website](https://rutterapi.com).
